pages.text: $(l:https://discord.gg/BFT4d5HeFX)Create discord server$(/l)$(br)On this discord server you can learn all kinds of information. It is a place to ask questions and help you troubleshoot your builds.$(br2)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jDIuWv7ROi8)This is Create$(/l) is the offical trailer video. I was blown away when I first saw this!

$(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4kdQD_gYbdY)Create .3.1 Update!$(/l)$(br)New and updated features. There are many new and exciting features added. If you use brass funnels you will need to watch this video as it introduces the Smart Chute which replaces some functionality of the Brass Funnel.

pages.title: Create Mod Tutorials
pages.text: $(l:https://youtu.be/jlvW8jAUU_U)Rockit14$(/l) has a wonderful spotlight series featuring Create. His videos are very informative and to the point and don't waste a lot of time. His examples are easy to follow. I highly recommend watching this entire series.$(br2)Rockit14 shows the $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QT9tc9GlTeI)0.3.2f update$(/l) and covers the new $(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QT9tc9GlTeI&t=27s)Toolbox$(/l)

$(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3NVsgAMv1rk)Create Mod Basics$(/l) by Monkey Farm also has some very good Create videos.$(br2)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lG_Z-tJ0hKY)Create: Get Started! Bit-by-Bit$(/l) by Mischief of Mice! There are several more videos highlighting Create by Mischief of Mice.
